comments.author: coin-investor
comments.created_time: July 15, 2023, 11:59:59 AMLast edit: July 15, 2023, 01:25:36 PM by coin-investor
comments.body: This is not the right section for your announcement, this is an altcoin discussion it should be in the altcoin service section, I would like to warn everybody that this platform is only two days old and there's always a risk in using a platform that's being promoted by newbies, be cautious using this platform they might use shilling to promote this service so beware.QuoteDomain:exchanger.inkRegistrar:NameCheap, Inc.Registered On:2023-07-13Expires On:2024-07-13Updated On:2023-07-13Status:clientTransferProhibitedserverTransferProhibitedaddPeriodName Servers:mary.ns.cloudflare.commalcolm.ns.cloudflare.comhttps://www.whois.com/whois/exchanger.ink¬†be cautious using this platform they might use shilling to promote this service like this one so bewareQuote from: algoritms100 on July 15, 2023, 09:31:13 AMinteresting i used yesterday it was working fine for paypal, fee is good, Amazing service!

comments.author: livingfree
comments.body: The first thing that I have noticed is that color grading/glow that you've put in color red. It sucks in my eyes and too dark.Quote from: algoritms100 on July 15, 2023, 09:31:13 AMinteresting i used yesterday it was working fine for paypal, fee is good, Amazing service!Are you sure that you are someone else and not related to OP or you're actually OP? A two days old exchange that have been found, used and trusted already by a stranger?That sounds strange. Anyway, I didn't proceed to check the website as my browser has given me a warning if I continue.

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.body: It looks like a complete rip-off of exchanger.ws, and they don't even have any terms at all. I wonder how people are supposed to use a service that doesn't even have terms laid out.It's brand-new, and we have a newbie account shilling about how great the exchanger is. I wouldn't recommend anyone to use it due to the shady behavior. Very likely a scam.
